name: Flight (itch) (CARL FARRA!!)
description:
[student project]

In Flight, take control of a bird and color the skies. Go through different flowers to change color, and use water to wash yourself off and erase your creations.

Controls:
Mouse - Fly
Space - Flap
Left Shift - Draw
Enter - Zoom out
Arrow Keys - Pan while zoomed out

The music is from the game Cloud by Jenova Chen, and is not mine.
